fullText: Immersive theater should feel participatory and intriguing, but right from the beginning Here Lies Love (Broadway Theatre, booking to Sept 3) feels hectoring—before ultimately becoming a big, baffling Broadway mess.

keyPhrases.quote: feels hectoring—before ultimately becoming a big, baffling Broadway mess
